Title: The Illustrated Woman
Writer: Philip K. Dick (based on the book by), Frank Spotnitz (developed by), Thomas Schnauz, Evan Wright
Actors: Alexa Davalos, Rupert Evans, Luke Kleintank, DJ Qualls
Plot: Joe and Juliana must act quickly as a vicious bounty hunter known as The Marshal arrives in Canon City. Tagomi makes plans with Wegener to pass valuable secrets from the Reich, and Frank plots his revenge against the Japanese.
